entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:32 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:32 PM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
